ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL( Paychex_PEO_Issue__c,"Yes"), RecordTypeId ="012700000001kI1", ISPICKVAL( PEO_Notice_Type__c,""), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received")), NOT(BEGINS(TEXT(Closure_Code__c),"Withdrawn")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PEO Notice Type in PEO Specific Detail Section cannot be blank
